short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NeuralSearchX is a search engine that allows you to search for information on the web using state-of-the-art artificial intelligence

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NeuralSearchX is a search engine that allows you to search for information on the web using state-of-the-art artificial intelligence. It also provides a summary of the results and evidence supporting the answer.
